text: Hi , I am Trying to generate Access token from ODBC test tool and given all detail like host client id & secret, scope & Redirect URI= <http://localhost:6367> but while generating Access token I am getting error *an invalid redirect_uri was provided. Please contact the app developer*. Please look into issue and provide resolution soon.

What do you mean with ‘Activity’?
First thought is 2 custom props on the Deal record that are set via a workflow triggered by the specific ‘activities’
